Messages.Author: Sarah Penelope Marie Freund
Messages.Content: Dear all, since it will get very hot today, the weather forecast predicts up to 33 degrees, I decided to do our session online via Zoom. Please spread the word to your fellow students so everyone is informed. We will talk about disabilities, especially deafness, and its silencing. Here is the link to the Zoom meeting: https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/8598658337?pwd=anBMbjE1Y2pnUzNsSk93WHdsR0N3Zz09 Meeting-ID: 859 865 8337 Kenncode: 765108 See you all later, Penelope
